name: Ultimate Attack
description:
Ultimate Attack is a local, two-player fighting game where the only way to win is to unleash your ultimate attack!

Slow down your opponent with regular attacks, and then when the time is right, use your ultimate to defeat them.

Inspired by Finishing Blow - the RPG without a health bar by groverburger: https://groverburger.itch.io/finishing-blow

Controls:

Ultimate attack requires two controllers or keyboards to play

- Menu Up: W, Up, D-Pad Up, or Left Thumbstick Up

- Menu Down: S, Down, D-Pad Down, or Left Thumbstick Down

- Select Option/Attack: Space, Enter, or Bottom Controller Button

Info for the August 2019 UE4Jam:

Theme: Make it Count

- In Ultimate Attack, charging your ultimate leaves you wide open to attacks. You have to slow your opponent down first, and then pick the perfect moment to launch your attack. Make it count!

Special Categories: Solo and Tiny (Under 100MB)

Team: WalkupAndAway (Solo)

Pre-Existing Content Used in Submission:

- UE4 SK_Mannequin Skeletal Mesh

- UE4 Skybox

- UINav (Marketplace Asset)

- Background Music from Mega Music Pack (Marketplace Asset)

- Character Animations from Mixamo

- Knewave Font
